name: Falling Sky
description:
Week 2 of Make a Game in one week :

Falling sky, third person game where you have to survive to a rain of blocks.

If you want to become the king of the sky rise up your score and become the best.

Keys : 

z : move forward

s: move backward

q: move left

d: move right

space : to jump

you can reset your jump by touching the ground or a block.

Enjoy and fill free to comment.
